website_summaries.verdict: The well-designed Moshi Mythro earbuds feature quality sound at an affordable price.
pros: The affordably priced Moshi Mythro in-ear headphones are lightweight and fit comfortably
They sound good for the money and have an integrated microphone and one-button remote for making cell phone calls
cons: no volume controls on integrated remote

customer_reviews.title: Best For Money!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. Great sound quality. Bass is rich, Mids are great, Highs good. Would recommend to anyone with ears.
customer_reviews.author: jvhuber

customer_reviews.title: They were at my price point and had good reviews from CNET
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap pair of headphones for work, but also ones that still delivered half decent sound. Yeah, I know, I want my cake and to eat it as well... However, I did get lucky with these headphones! They were at my price point and had good reviews from CNET. My only complaint is about the size of the buds themselves. The set comes with small, medium and large, and I chose the size that I use for other headphones, but they don't always stay in my ears properly. It's not a major problem as I only use them when sitting at my desk, but I wouldn't use these for walking or running if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling is excellent but the earbuds are bit uncomfortable to achieve such ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid for the price but I kind of wish I went with Audio Technica. The bass is very strong, a bit too strong in my opinion. Noise canceling is excellent but the earbuds are bit uncomfortable to achieve such a tight seal. Giving this 4 stars instead of 3 because the attached mic is surprisingly good... better than the mic on my USB Logitech gaming headset. The button is pretty handy as well. 1 click to pause/play. 2 clicks to go to the next song. 3 clicks to go to the previous song. The build quality seems very solid but only time will tell. Overall a good pair of earbuds for working out. I just personally prefer Audio Technica earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-priced option for music lovers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound quality, and the voice mic works fine. Multiple size range ends are included so fit should not be a problem. I use these outdoors on workouts, and they hold pretty well but do let in a lot of ambient noise. I rotate among these, Panasonic RP-HJE120's and Amazon Kindle premiums and would put these #2 of the three in terms of sound quality and overall value, with Amazon's sounding better and less expensive (when on flash sales). The Panasonic's are better value at everyday pricing, but these definitely sound better if you are listening to music and want broader tonal range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: superior sounds from little speakers
customer_reviews.text: I stopped doing reviews for several reason but these little speakers make listening a pleasure. The sounds are like listening in a great hall that has surround sound. The bases to trebles unbelievable great sounds. How are these little speakers creating such sounds. Thanks. The only draw back is the cord is short.for listening to a Lap Top and sitting in my easy chair or the cable coming from my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Liking Shoping

customer_reviews.title: Love them, great for travel, noisy airplanes
customer_reviews.text: Love these earbuds. They're not noise-cancelling, but they really do block out a great deal of noise. I constantly use them on travel and they're so much more compact than bringing the larger, over-the-ear headphones. Sound is very good to me (I'm not an audiophile, but they do have some rich bass in my opinion). Work very well on the plane to block out the noise. Nice that they come with different size ear-buds - the medium fit me just fine. Can also use them with your phone, as they have the microphone as well. Only drawback is that they don't have a volume control on them - but that's a minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Adams

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality for a sound price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of earbuds! Very happy with my purchase. I've never been disappointed with the many products I own from Moshi (i.e. two Versacovers for my iPads, a Sensecover for my iPhone 6+, a laptop sleeve for my Macbook Air). The sound quality is great in my opinion, and a definite step up from many of the factory earbuds that come with smartphones these days. I also really like the color coded earbuds, as it makes it much easier to tell which earbud belongs in which ear. Build quality is decent and sound isolation is pretty good considering that they are earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I've purchased many, many headphones over the years that one ear goes out on, or the volume dies, or a wire breaks, etc. These have been in my pocket every day for several months and have held up to daily use. They sound great as well, so long as you find buds that fit your ear. Strangly enough I have one ear that fits perfectly, and the other ear seems a bit lose even though I use the biggest buds available. Nevertheless I imagine that most people won't have this issue and will enjoy these great earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: As for the sound- I love the sound much more then much more expensive skull ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of those earbuds. The first one lived for over the year, and the only reason they died- they felt down from my pocket and they got squashed by the car door. They did survive the whole year of wearing and being stored in the side pocket with the cord being tangled, and also they survived the everyday workout with lot's of wet and sweat. As for the sound- I love the sound much more then much more expensive skull candy. Comfortable to wear. I will buy the third pair if needed...
customer_reviews.author: G. Kryvenka

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these earbuds. I use them for running, cycling, and at work, and they have stood up to every test. I usually have trouble finding earbuds that fit since I have relatively small ears, and these are very ergonomic and comfortable. I love that they have the microphone and pause/play button built into them. Perhaps my favourite feature is the alternately couloured buds that allow you to easily tell which ear is which (red for right!). As someone who is very particular about putting the correct bud in the correct ear, this saves me a lot of time in reading tiny font on the side of a pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Enicolle

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to find the right tip to get a perfect fit for my ear. It took less than a minute to find which sizes didn't work and the size that "the one". The buds stay comfortably in my ear. The sound is good, much better than default ear buds that came with my four year old phone. The pause button on the unit works fine. The replay and skip functions rarely work--probably due the the advanced age of my phone. These buds are only a few months old. If their life span is good I will definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These were great ear buds but fall out of the ear way ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great ear buds but fall out of the ear way too easy! Mine broke in a accident but they really took a beating before they broke. Great sound just wish they stayed in the ear better.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel ThreeZeroTwo

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I'm cheap by nature. Thirty bucks for earbuds is outrageous...except for these anyway. I listen to Audible books frequently and I'm tired of cheap earbuds that fall out, don't block out ambient noise well, make a reader's voice sound muddled, require squinting to discern the R from L earbud, and auto-adjust the volume due to a little sweat dripping into the volume control. These earbuds avoid all these downfalls. I ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: MChase

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stops working
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until one side stopped working 2 months later. They replaced it, but then the replacement only lasted 2-3 months. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not a replacement for iPhone Ear Pods
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I wanted. I found the earbuds to be a lot like earplugs. Extremely tight and blocked sound out, but uncomfortably so. Also, the single click button doesn't have volume controls (that I could see). The earbuds aren't labeled left or right, so you would have to figure this out some other way. The few songs I listened to sounded fine. For replacing iPhone Ear Pods, though, I would not buy this item. Bought mine and returned them the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Roustabout

customer_reviews.title: These are good!
customer_reviews.text: I have found that these earbuds are about the best I've ever owned. As a person with small ears, it is always a struggle for me to find earbuds that can stay inside my ears. I didn't have that problem with this set, even though my ears do become sweaty when wearing them for extended periods which does cause them to eventually slip out. The sound quality is outstanding and not to mention the fabulous color and design lends to an all round great pair of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: FionaM.

customer_reviews.title: One earbud stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After a month of limited use, one of the earbuds no longer works, would have expected a much longer life span.
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: For the price range they are a buy.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine with my Kindle Fire mostly for audio books and the sound is very good. The ear plugs are comfortable. There could be some instructions with them however in a font size one could read. I figured out which plug is right and which is left but they could have said.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Tole

customer_reviews.title: None of the earbuds fit
customer_reviews.text: While the sound quality is good and basically worth what you paid for none of the ear buds that came with it fit in my ear so the ear phones keep dropping out of my ear. A little annoying. I haven't had them long enough to determine longevity.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound/easy to break
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good sound but too easy to break. One good accidental pull on them and the coated wire came out of the connector. Real bummer. Rather expensive. My Bose cost $50 more but have lasted longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Pldu4

customer_reviews.title: look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality was good but they broke in a week of using them. Granted I am a heavy headphone/earbud user. I thought it was my phone that was broke because it had been doing that to every pair. But I checked it on my kindle and the right ear was muffled. Don't waste your money. Skull candy is a good brand for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: ... earbuds before because I didn't think you could get good sound out of them
customer_reviews.text: I've never used earbuds before because I didn't think you could get good sound out of them. I am totally amazed at how nice these sound! The bass is incredible. Never thought such good sound can come out of something so little. Better than my regular headset. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ambiani

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types of ear buds, and I like these the best. I didn't want to pay an outrageous price for earbuds, but I did want good sound quality and I needed a good fit. I also like the fact that the right ear bud is red, so you never have to guess which ear bud goes in which ear. They also have good background sound cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller ears
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a review because I have very small ears and have never really found a pair of earbuds that fit my ears. So, I was a bit apprehensive when I ordered this product. However, given Amazon's return policy, I figured I would give them a chance. The nice thing about the earbuds is that they have three different sizes. The small size fits my ear and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: c.santillane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and great sound! Coming from a much more expensive brand that broke, I'm very happy with these earbuds for their quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: I loved these earphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved these earphones. Great sound and great fit on my ears. My issue with these is that I purchased this in June of this year. However one earbud suddenly stopped working while I was on vacation. Didn't do anything crazy or different from what I've done with previous ear buds so I'm not sure what went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moshi Earbuds... does the job
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are okay. Sound isn't great and they still slide out your ear. I'm glad I got them on sale because I don't think they are worth more than $10 anyway. The speaker on the wires is cheap too. Bottomline is that.. I bought these earbuds because I didn't want any that looked like an ipod/iphone product so people wouldn't want to snatch them off my head, Moshi earbuds so these certainly do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad But You Can Do Better
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't satisfied with the range or clarity of these so I bought a set of Sony earbuds. These are not bad. There just not that good either. I paid just slightly more for easily detectable better quality with Sony MDR-EX100AP/L earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Goodwrench

customer_reviews.title: Really Good.
customer_reviews.text: You will not find better $30 headphones. Great range, clear, crisp sound. The noise isolation is very very good. I gave used them in a noisy bus and train to cut down on noise and it does so well. I haven't used the headphones for a call. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good pair of earbuds, but the single button on the pair sucks
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality even when wearing one at a time, wearing both headphones cancels out surrounding sound well while listening. Has comfortable ear buds that I can wear for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: For the price these can't be beat. I walk my dog and listen to audio books and these are great. Comes with three sets/sizes of ear buds. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dano1988

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product, just very hard to buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product, just very hard to buy. No local stores seem to carry these (in San Francisco, no less), and Amazon was out of stock with no estimated date of availability. The glue holding the two pieces of the actual earbud together didn't hold, so I had to super-glue it, a quick fix. Then I caught the cord on a doorknob and yanked the wires out of the plug! Emoji of red-faced idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets pulled too easily and is sometimes hard to get out of
customer_reviews.text: The drawback of these earbuds is that the cord is not slippery enough. Gets pulled too easily and is sometimes hard to get out of pockets
customer_reviews.author: Þorsteinn Jökull Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: great sounding earbuds. i've had these for well over a year and they still sound great. high quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: what when why

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of ear buds. I have small ears, and the smallest ear buds are too big for a good fit. Otherwise, the sound quality is great--better than my Kindle Fire HD alone. Thinking about returning them but don't know if they come any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Marm

customer_reviews.title: Best narrow earbuds I have found
customer_reviews.text: Best narrow earbuds I have found. I still have trouble fitting my tiny ear canal openings, but at least these do not hurt me. The regular earbuds provided with my iPod were actually painful. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have great sound are small and lightweight and they have interchangeable ear pieces so numerous people can use them..
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Winn

customer_reviews.title: I think the bass is a little better then the $5 pairs I always get so 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the bass is a little better then the $5 pairs I always get so 3 stars. But not worth the extra $25 just for a little better bass.
customer_reviews.author: william lufkin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST Earbuds I have ever had! The sound is awesome and they are extremely comfortable and stay snugly in the ear. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Deakin

customer_reviews.title: So So Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: For a top pick headset from an Amazon ad, the earbuds seemed to mask the loudness of sound and results in my increasing the volume of the devices for whatever I'm listening to. At least the cost was minimal to try this device. I would think twice before buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: m brian quan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to listen to audio books. Very satisfied with the product. Clear and precise sound. Would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: nozierozie

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds provide pretty decent sound for the price. Slightly tinny in the upper ranges, to my ear, but I'm pleased overall. They fit comfortably in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: trp9004

customer_reviews.title: Good Earbuds With Average Durability
customer_reviews.text: Good Ear Buds. Overall I really like them. The sound is crisp and clear. The bass isn't great and another identical pair malfunctioned within 10 months. But overall I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Liberts

customer_reviews.title: No  regrets here
customer_reviews.text: My old ear buds gave up the ghost. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rehab nut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality these earbuds provide. Comfortable and they do come with different sizes to choose for your ears.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Won't stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: They were great while they lasted. I haven't even had them 3 months yet and one of the buds has already stopped work. Kind of a rip off when you can get a pair of skull candy earbuds for $20, that will last years. The only reason they aren't getting less stars is because the sound quality was pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried others, therefore can't give an hones comparison. It's good that there are different sizes of earbuds, but none seemed to fit properly............fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Reading

customer_reviews.title: but the sound quality and bass are very good for earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting to see how long they last before I give them five stars, but the sound quality and bass are very good for earbuds. They also fit comfortably in my ear (they come with a few different sizes of buds) and do a pretty good job of blocking out background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: They a'ight
customer_reviews.text: They are okay, but the sound tends to get distorted if I try to jog with them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service and great sound!! They fit comfortably in my ears--they even block a lot of sound out on an airplane. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, a great price.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for earbuds that have a great sound AND full bass, includes a headset microphone, and comes in at a great price, then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Micro Lightweight Moshi Earbuds.....
customer_reviews.text: The Moshi Mythro Earbuds were to my satisfaction. The clarity of the audio when listening to music or the reading of a book is excellent.. ..... Very light weight......you hardly know you have them in your ears......The three sets of cushions allow a change of size for different audio programs.........
customer_reviews.author: iris k. neels

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price . Could be a little better though. What makes them sound good is because the size of the ear bud that is interchangeable. ( you can buy them usually where you can find earphones, for most earbuds. Just saying) this one comes with three sizes . I was expecting a little more eumph sort of say but still good.
customer_reviews.author: scott burdette

customer_reviews.title: Better other options
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was good however, The right earbud was louder than the left.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Rader

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday, phones and mp3's
customer_reviews.text: Tinny tones, preferred range offered by another brand. Will keep as backup pair for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Penguingirl

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with them.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! The sound is great and they are light weight and fit comfortably in my ear. Really nice with audible books.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: It isn't a complicated matter. I plugged these into my Kindle Fire and they worked just fine. Good quality sound. They come with two other different sized ear pieces in case the ones already attached do not fit your ears properly. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Moshi Mythro Earbuds with Headset Mc
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying these items every day they are wonderful. The sound is great and very nice I can increase or decrease the level of sound.
customer_reviews.author: C. Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Great price. Very comfortable. Four stars due to lack of volume control
customer_reviews.author: jasontandy

customer_reviews.title: They are great! I use them while traveling to watch shows ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great! I use them while traveling to watch shows on my Kindle. I do not disturb my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: Listening Pleasure
customer_reviews.text: The choice of different plugs is great. Good sound and hours of listening to your music - traveling, at home, in bed - without disturbing others. I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: G_Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great little set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Have an iPhone and they work great. Cable is thin and flexible, but I wish it also controlled volume. No big deal because they are so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Duquette

customer_reviews.title: been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Would buy from again. I have been looking for some ear buds for my kindle. I haven't used yet but will be nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I like them mainly because they have various sizes of rubber ear buds that can fit most every ear size!
customer_reviews.author: Jayruswv

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the style. Shipment right on time. Sound is fantastic. Would recommend this product to everyone. Glow in the dark would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good value and performance for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat them for the money. Excellent range, good ear fit and outside noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Guy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but difficult to stay in ears even with the good quality hybrid earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Geffken

customer_reviews.title: moshie mythro earbuds
customer_reviews.text: these ear buds are used with the kindle hdx 8.9. my hearing is very bad but the sound from these buds are great.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds Great - Mic  Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: Using for the phone use in the car. Extremely comfortable ear buds and hear very well, but the microphone is demanding and often has to be held to the mouth for the other person to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hatland

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They work really well of me. I use them with my Kindle Fire and so far have had no problems or issues with them. I would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: James Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, love the color and has multiple sizes which are included. Sound is great and light weight. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Revier Believer

customer_reviews.title: These look great, and the sound is great
customer_reviews.text: These look great, and the sound is great. I like the feature that the right ear but is read it's much easier than looking for the right or left.
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Good Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go along with my Kindle Fire. Works well with the Kindle, sound is clear. Stays in my ears. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KAT10

customer_reviews.title: Terrific audio quality and decent noise dampening/canceling
customer_reviews.text: Terrific audio quality and decent noise dampening/canceling, especially considering the price point. And very comfy and snug. Love these, might be a second pair as spares.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stevens

customer_reviews.title: comfortable with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Though I did have a fairly long wait for delivery, these are well worth the wait Great sound quality and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the ear buds were a little easier to fit, but this model fit my Kindle Fire HDX 7 just perfectly and works great!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hoogland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had a bit of a time finding a headset for my Kindle, and these work very well.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Moshi Earbuds Are Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds work fine, but the unexpected plus was the "corral" for the 'buds when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the ear buds that I purchased. They do all that I want them to do and fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love them I just wish that the cord wouldn't get so tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Dj Phat Kid

customer_reviews.title: great Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, they came with 3 different sizes of ear buds. Fine sound.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: 00 Panasonic ear buds have better sound if you can forgo the mic
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality disappointing based on generally favorable reviews, particularly the bass. $8.00 Panasonic ear buds have better sound if you can forgo the mic.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ears
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with these earbuds. They are very comfortable & work very well. I only wish I had ordered them earlier!
customer_reviews.author: MVikingGal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pls as sed with performance, but have since seem others for less.
customer_reviews.author: truewest

customer_reviews.title: Left ear-bud is already rattling/blown out after moderate volume play
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for a couple weeks and the left ear-bud is rattling already. I've only used them on walks to work and on two flights, so it was at moderate volume. I didn't play them at high volume whatsoever. I guess that's what you get for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: the Earbuds are really great, like the pkg they come in that has ...
customer_reviews.text: the Earbuds are really great, like the pkg they come in that has 4sets of adapter ear inserts so you are able to match the perfect fit for your ears to maximize your listening experience
customer_reviews.author: ken bellis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price. Never fall out of my ears when I'm running!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they've been great the few times I have
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them very much yet, but they've been great the few times I have!
customer_reviews.author: A. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones, really comfortable, but the left ear stopped working after like 4 months of regular use. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pettitt

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works and sounds great, but doesn't have a clip to hold wires out of the way. This can be somewhat annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: martyinbucks

customer_reviews.title: Moshi Mythro earbuds review
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the clarity and transparency in the mid and high ranges but a little disappointed in the large bass roll off. Very good for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: -Paula E. Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as Christmas gifts and everybody was very happy. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Koby

customer_reviews.title: and the different size buds make a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: You hear clearly, and the different size buds make a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Love

customer_reviews.title: these have a great sound--fit nicely as well
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these have a great sound--fit nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great buds. Sounds, bass, tones perfect. However, they do not work with my phone as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Webster

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They provide great sound. Love them. I don't usually like earbuds because the sound is shrillish, but these are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfotable and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I wear mine to sleep..blocks out noises very well. 3 sizes come with the ear buds. I also love the color coding for left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Clear and Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earbuds. I've tried others and not been satisfied. With the Moshi earbuds, I can hear clearly and they really do block out any other noise or distraction.
customer_reviews.author: debtee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The headsets are great. Great quality and sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Veedeek

product_meta.title: Moshi Mythro In-Ear Earphones with Microphone, 3.5mm Headphone Jack, Wired Earbuds with HandyStrap, Gunmetal Gray
feature_bullets: DR8 Neodymium drivers (15 Hz-20 kHz / -10dB@1kHz) in an anodized aluminum casing. With 3.5mm headphone jack.
Integrated microphone with universal button control.
Hybrid injection earbuds (3 sizes: S/M/L) for great noise isolation and comfort.
Includes a convenient HandyStrap cable manager.
10-Year Global Warranty: All Moshi products are eligible for our 10-year Global Warranty program. Learn more about our industry-leading coverage on Warranty Info Page on Moshi’s official website.
